zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[区间震荡，谨慎操作]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX）在13.3343美元附近交易，整体呈现出区间震荡的趋势。24小时内价格小幅下跌0.40%，显示出市场缺乏明确的方向。高点和低点分别为13.4051和13.3309，表明短期内价格波动较小，市场情绪相对谨慎。

技术指标方面，当前的MACD值为-0.0073833820，显示出市场可能处于弱势状态，尽管信号线数据缺失，无法进一步确认趋势。SMA(20)指标为13.40957，价格低于该均线，进一步支持了短期内看空的判断。RSI指标未能提供，因此需谨慎解读当前市场状态。

支撑位方面，13.3309美元将是关键支撑，如果价格跌破该水平，可能导致进一步下行。阻力位则在13.4051美元附近，若价格突破此水平，可能带来反弹的机会。在操作策略上，建议投资者保持谨慎，考虑在支撑位附近寻找买入机会，同时在阻力位附近设置止损以控制风险。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Avalanche (AVAX) against the US Dollar stands at 13.3343, reflecting a slight decline of 0.40% over the past 24 hours. The price action is currently hovering near the lower boundary of its recent range, with a high of 13.4051 and a low of 13.3309. This tight trading range suggests a period of consolidation, potentially indicating indecision among traders. A breakout above 13.4051 could signal a reversal in trend, while a drop below 13.3309 may confirm bearish sentiment.

The absence of the RSI and the current MACD value of -0.0074 suggests that AVAX is experiencing a neutral to slightly bearish momentum. However, the SMA(20) at 13.40957 indicates a slight downward trend in the short term. Traders should monitor these indicators closely; if the MACD crosses above its signal line in the coming days, it may provide a bullish signal. Conversely, sustained weakness below the SMA could lead to further downside pressure.

Key support levels to watch include the recent low of 13.3309, which has proven strong in the short term. A breach of this level could open the door for further declines, potentially targeting the psychological level of 13.00. On the resistance side, 13.4051 stands as a critical barrier; a decisive move above this level could encourage buying pressure and target higher levels around 13.50 or even 14.00.

For traders considering their positions, a cautious approach may be warranted. Those looking to enter a long position might wait for a confirmed breakout above 13.4051, ideally accompanied by an increase in volume. Conversely, if bearish momentum persists and the price falls through support at 13.3309, short positions could be considered, targeting lower support levels while managing risk effectively.
